Northampton General Hospital today revealed the biggest one-day jump in confirmed Covid-19 deaths for more than a month.

articles.title: Coronavirus: PSNI beauty spot crackdown ahead of expected sun-soaked weekend - Belfast Telegraph
articles.description: The PSNI is upping patrols at beauty spots this weekend to prevent large crowds from gathering in the sun and flouting lockdown restrictions.
articles.content:
